title: Permanent Ban - KnixFice
body: For My Early Birthday Present, My Step Dad had let me spend $100 on whatever I wanted so I had spent it all on League Of Legends. I was super excited and bought all the merch  that i've wanted since I started playing League, but a week or two later his card was declined while trying to get an Uber and forgot which card that he let me use, so he filed for identity fraud (IKR) and had the bank withdraw everything that I had bought and I was banned for a store charge back not too long ago. I just want to get the ban off my tail and continue to play with the community. Sincerely - A Loyal Player

replies.body:
Happy belated birthday!!!

Since your step dad issued a [**chargeback **](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201753334) on that purchase, the money was returned to his bank and your account was locked. We have not removed any of the content purchased so that once the amount is repaid you will still have everything you bought. You should be able to sign into [**Riot Repayments**](https://repay.leagueoflegends.com/) when you're ready.
